instruction.head: Anleitung
instruction.intro: Detailed information on the conduct of the program:
instruction.step: Please read the task carefully and if necessary use the online help for the tasks.
Start with the solution of the tasks. At the same time the timer is started. The greater the difficulty of the task, the more time you have available.
Personal assessment: Assess yourself on a five-point scale integer if you felt in solving the task completely insecure (-2) to fully secure (+2).
Compare your solution with the sample solution.
Correctness: Choose here in percent compliance with the sample solution.

Statistics: The overall results are output for each task of the tests in the form of a diagram. The two lines indicate the area in which the results should be. Below the range means you should still do something in and above the range means your score is good or very good.
People involved in the app development: Tobias Kutzner, Christian Steinert, Abdellah Azendour, Carlos Trujillo, Lando Eisenmann, Prof. Dr.-Ing. Ingrid Bönninger, Prof. Dr. habil. Olga Wälder
